languages.text: {n}Равор не то фыркает, не то усмехается.{/n} "Не думаю, Лорд-капитан. Да и смысла нет: их проще прибить, чем маневры совершать. Предупредим Футфол о нашем прибытии заранее макрозалпами!"

{n}Ravor snorts, or perhaps chuckles.{/n} "I don't think so, Lord Cap'n. There'd be no reason to — it'll be easier to blast these scum to smithereens than to evade them. We'll warn Footfall we're coming with a few macro salvos!"
languages.original_text: {n}Равор не то фыркает, не то усмехается.{/n} "Не думаю, Лорд-капитан. Да и смысла нет: их проще прибить, чем маневры совершать. Предупредим Футфол о нашем прибытии заранее макрозалпами!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor snorts, or perhaps chuckles.{/n} "I do not think so, Lord Captain. And besides, it would make no sense, they are easier to evaporate than to evade. Let us warn Footfall of our arrival with macro salvos!"

{n}Ravor snorts, or perhaps chuckles.{/n} "I do not think so, Lord Captain. And besides, it would make no sense, they are easier to evaporate than to evade. Let us warn Footfall of our arrival with macro salvos!"

{n}Ravor snorts, or perhaps chuckles.{/n} "I don't think so, Lord Cap'n. There'd be no reason to — it'll be easier to blast these scum to smithereens than to evade them. We'll warn Footfall we're coming with a few macro salvos!"

{n}Ravor snorts, or perhaps chuckles.{/n} "I don't think so, Lord Cap'n. There'd be no reason to — it'll be easier to blast these scum to smithereens than to evade them. We'll warn Footfall we're coming with a few macro salvos!"

{n}Ravor snorts, or perhaps chuckles.{/n} "I don't think so, Lord Cap'n. There'd be no reason to — it'll be easier to blast these scum to smithereens than to evade them. We'll warn Footfall we're coming with a few macro salvos!"

languages.text: {n}ラヴォアは鼻で笑う。いや、もしかするとクスクスと笑っているのかもしれない。{/n}「そうは思いませんよ、ロード・キャプテン。奴らを回避する理由などないでしょう。この下衆どもを避けるより、吹き飛ばすほうが簡単だと思います。マクロ・サルヴォ数発で、フットフォールに私たちの到来を警告しましょう！」
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor snorts, or perhaps chuckles.{/n} "I don't think so, Lord Cap'n. There'd be no reason to — it'll be easier to blast these scum to smithereens than to evade them. We'll warn Footfall we're coming with a few macro salvos!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ラヴォアは鼻で笑う。いや、もしかするとクスクスと笑っているのかもしれない。{/n}「そうは思いませんよ、ロード・キャプテン。奴らを回避する理由などないでしょう。この下衆どもを避けるより、吹き飛ばすほうが簡単だと思います。マクロ・サルヴォ数発で、フットフォールに私たちの到来を警告しましょう！」

languages.text: {n}Ravor renifle, ce qui semble être chez lui l'équivalent d'un gloussement.{/n} « Je ne pense pas, {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}. Ça ne vaut pas vraiment la peine. Il sera sûrement plus facile de les réduire en miettes que d'essayer de les éviter. On va avertir Castel de notre arrivée avec un petit feu d'artifice ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor snorts, or perhaps chuckles.{/n} "I don't think so, Lord Cap'n. There'd be no reason to — it'll be easier to blast these scum to smithereens than to evade them. We'll warn Footfall we're coming with a few macro salvos!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor renifle, ce qui semble être chez lui l'équivalent d'un gloussement.{/n} « Je ne pense pas, {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}. Ça ne vaut pas vraiment la peine. Il sera sûrement plus facile de les réduire en miettes que d'essayer de les éviter. On va avertir Castel de notre arrivée avec un petit feu d'artifice ! »

languages.text: {n}雷沃哼了一声，又或许是笑了笑。{/n}“这场战斗恐怕躲不掉，船长老大，而且也没理由躲。比起躲开他们，把他们炸成碎片要简单多了。咱们可以来上几轮齐射，警告整个落脚港，咱们到了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor snorts, or perhaps chuckles.{/n} "I don't think so, Lord Cap'n. There'd be no reason to — it'll be easier to blast these scum to smithereens than to evade them. We'll warn Footfall we're coming with a few macro salvos!"

traits.locale_text: {n}雷沃哼了一声，又或许是笑了笑。{/n}“这场战斗恐怕躲不掉，船长老大，而且也没理由躲。比起躲开他们，把他们炸成碎片要简单多了。咱们可以来上几轮齐射，警告整个落脚港，咱们到了！”

languages.text: {n}Ravor resopla... o quizás se ríe.{/n} «Lo dudo, Lord Capi. No habría razón para ello; será más fácil hacer añicos a esta escoria que evadirlos. ¡Avisaremos a Paso de que llegamos con unas cuantas macrosalvas!».
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor snorts, or perhaps chuckles.{/n} "I don't think so, Lord Cap'n. There'd be no reason to — it'll be easier to blast these scum to smithereens than to evade them. We'll warn Footfall we're coming with a few macro salvos!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor resopla... o quizás se ríe.{/n} «Lo dudo, Lord Capi. No habría razón para ello; será más fácil hacer añicos a esta escoria que evadirlos. ¡Avisaremos a Paso de que llegamos con unas cuantas macrosalvas!».

languages.text: {n}Ravor schnaubt, oder vielleicht ist es ein Lachen.{/n} "Das glaube ich kaum, Lord Cap'n. Dafür gäbe es keinen Grund. Es ist leichter, diesen Abschaum zu pulverisieren, als ihnen auszuweichen. Wir warnen Footfall, dass wir ein paar Makrosalven abfeuern werden!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor snorts, or perhaps chuckles.{/n} "I don't think so, Lord Cap'n. There'd be no reason to — it'll be easier to blast these scum to smithereens than to evade them. We'll warn Footfall we're coming with a few macro salvos!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor schnaubt, oder vielleicht ist es ein Lachen.{/n} "Das glaube ich kaum, Lord Cap'n. Dafür gäbe es keinen Grund. Es ist leichter, diesen Abschaum zu pulverisieren, als ihnen auszuweichen. Wir warnen Footfall, dass wir ein paar Makrosalven abfeuern werden!"

languages.text: {n}Ravor, homurtu ve kıkırtı arası bir ses çıkarıyor.{/n} "Sanmıyorum Lord Kaptan. Kaçınmamız için herhangi bir neden göremiyorum. Bu pislikleri patlatıp geçsek daha kolay olur. Binliman'a haber verelim, gelişimiz olaylı olacak!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor snorts, or perhaps chuckles.{/n} "I don't think so, Lord Cap'n. There'd be no reason to — it'll be easier to blast these scum to smithereens than to evade them. We'll warn Footfall we're coming with a few macro salvos!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor, homurtu ve kıkırtı arası bir ses çıkarıyor.{/n} "Sanmıyorum Lord Kaptan. Kaçınmamız için herhangi bir neden göremiyorum. Bu pislikleri patlatıp geçsek daha kolay olur. Sonra da Binliman'a, makro ganimetlerle geldiğimizi haber ederiz!"
